column4: can some1 help me plz ... i have installed g++ and i want to start programming :( but i dont know how to run it
when i type g++ it asks me for input file
so there is no user interface ?
is there any user interface program that can make it easier?
my god linux is so hard
but what about libraries like conio.h and others does it accept them by default?
do you knowo any good online source for starters? i have started with linux.org lessons
how much you learn and how fast depends on your effort
if you are planning to stick with ubuntu or debian google for "apt howto" or install the  apt-howto package
if you install that package and run the command  apt-howto it will open in a browser
maybe you would get more help in a C++ channel
